description: Try our easy to follow Red Curry Salmon Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Red Curry Salmon Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain noodles and divide between serving bowls. Pour over soup and garnish with coriander. Serve with lime.
